```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
1. convert to .csv
First String    Second      1.22      3.4
Second          More Text   1.555555  2.2220
Third           x           3         124
```
FIND: (/s/s*)
REPLACE: /,
```
First,String,Second,1.22,3.4,Second,More,Text,1.555555,2.2220,Third,x,3,124,

2.
```
FIND: (\w+)\, (\w+)\, (.+)
REPLACE: \2 \1 (\3)

```
3.
```
FIND: .mp3\s
REPLACE:.mp3\n
```
4.
```
FIND:^(\d{4})\s(.*)(\.mp3)
REPLACE:\2_\1.mp3
```
5.
```
FIND:^(\w)\w+,(\w+),(\d*.\d*),(\d*)
REPLACE:\1_\2,\4
```
6.
```
FIND:^(\w)\w+,(\w{4})\w+,(\d*.\d*),(\d*)
REPLACE:\1_\2,\4
```
7. 
```
FIND:^(\w{3})\w+,(\w{3})\w+,(\d*.\d*),(\d*)
REPLACE:\1\2, \4, \3
```
